hibernate-mapping.query: select max(i.ipqamchannelid) from IpQamChannel i where i.ipqamchannelid like :id
select max(s.storagedirid) from StorageDir s where s.storagedirid like :id
select v from VodServer v,WebSVodSRel r where v.vodsid=r.vodsid and r.websid=:id
select s from Storage s,StorageVsRel r where s.storageid=r.storageid and r.vodsid=:id
